snippet.title: ARC Raiders: Week 4 Trials! How To 3-Star Every Challenge Fast & Solo
snippet.description:
Raiders! Week 4 of competitive Trials is here, and we’re breaking down every challenge so you can secure easy 3-star rankings and climb the leaderboards. From efficient Leaper farming to mastering harvest routes and maximizing major map modifiers, this guide gives you everything you need to push points solo or with a squad. Stay sharp, extract safely, and dominate this week’s Trials.

0:00 Intro
2:00 Trial 1 - Damage Leapers
2:47 Trial 2 - Damage Queens Or Matriarchs
3:35 Trial 3 - Harvest Plants
5:22 Trial 4 - Open ARC Probes
6:29 Trial 5 - Damage Flying ARC Enemies
7:59 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders

*Our NEW 'Topside' Merch Is Now Available*
